verses.verse: In the year <WH8141> that king <WH4428> Uzziah <WH5818> died, <WH4194> I saw <WH7200> the <WH853> Lord <WH136> sitting <WH3427> on a throne, <WH3678> high <WH7311> and lifted up; <WH5375> and his train <WH7757> filled <WH4392> the temple. <WH1964>

Above <WH4605> him stood <WH5975> the seraphim. <WH8314> Each <WH259> one had six <WH8337> wings. <WH3671> With two <WH8147> he covered <WH3680> his face. <WH6440> With two <WH8147> he covered <WH3680> his feet. <WH7272> With two <WH8147> he flew. <WH5774>
One called <WH7121> to another, <WH559> and said, "Holy, <WH6918> holy, <WH6918> holy, <WH6918> is Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies! <WH6635> The whole earth <WH776> is full <WH4393> of his glory! <WH3519>"
The foundations <WH520> of the thresholds <WH5592> shook <WH5128> at the voice <WH6963> of him who called, <WH7121> and the house <WH1004> was filled <WH4390> with smoke. <WH6227>

Then I said, <WH559> "Woe <WH188> is me! <WH1820> For I am undone, because I am a man <WH376> of unclean <WH2931> lips, <WH8193> and I dwell <WH3427> in the midst <WH8432> of a people <WH5971> of unclean <WH2931> lips: <WH8193> for my eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200> the King, <WH4428> Yahweh <WH3068> of Armies! <WH6635>"
Then one <WH259> of the seraphim <WH8314> flew <WH5774> to me, <WH7531> having a live coal in his hand, <WH3027> which he had taken <WH3947> with the tongs <WH4457> from off the altar. <WH4196>

He touched <WH5060> my mouth <WH6310> with it, <WH559> and said, "Behold, <WH5060> this has touched your lips; <WH8193> and your iniquity <WH5771> is taken away, <WH5493> and your sin <WH2403> forgiven. <WH3722>"
I heard <WH8085> the Lord <WH136>'s voice, <WH6963> saying, <WH559> "Whom shall I send, <WH7971> and who will go <WH3212> for us? <WH559>" Then I said, "Here I am. <WH7971> Send me!"

He said, <WH559> "Go, <WH3212> and tell <WH559> this people, <WH5971> <WH8085> 'You hear indeed, <WH8085> but don't <WH995> understand; and you see <WH7200> indeed, <WH7200> but don't <WH3045> perceive.'

Make the heart <WH3820> of this people <WH5971> fat. <WH8080> Make their ears <WH241> heavy, <WH3513> and shut <WH8173> their eyes; <WH5869> lest they see <WH7200> with their eyes, <WH5869> and hear <WH8085> with their ears, <WH241> and understand <WH995> with their heart, <WH3824> and turn <WH7725> again, <WH7495> and be healed."

Then I said, <WH559> "Lord, <WH136> how long? <WH559>" He answered, "Until cities <WH5892> are waste <WH7582> without inhabitant, <WH3427> and houses <WH1004> without man, <WH120> and the land <WH127> becomes utterly <WH8077> waste, <WH7582>
And Yahweh <WH3068> has removed <WH7368> men <WH120> far away, <WH7368> and the forsaken <WH5805> places are many <WH7227> in the midst <WH7130> of the land. <WH776>

If there is a tenth <WH6224> left in it, <WH7725> that also will in turn be consumed: <WH1197> as a terebinth, <WH424> and as an oak, <WH437> whose stock <WH4678> remains when they are felled; <WH7995> so the holy <WH6944> seed <WH2233> is its stock. <WH4678>"
